price: Àwọn tó gbàgbọ́ ní òdodo, tí wọ́n sì ṣe àwọn iṣẹ́ rere, àwọn wọ̀nyẹn ni èrò inú Ọgbà Ìdẹ̀ra. Olùṣegbére ni wọ́n nínú rẹ̀.
arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَعَمِلُواْ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتِ أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ أَصۡحَٰبُ ٱلۡجَنَّةِۖ هُمۡ فِيهَا خَٰلِدُونَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: wa-alladhīna āmanū waʿamilū al-ṣāliḥāti ulāika aṣḥābu al-janati hum fīhā khālidūna
